channel.title: MineKingdom <City> <Survival> <PVP>
channel.description:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/LQ6VZdW.png[/img] [size=36pt][b]MineKingdom[/b][/size]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GGdT8uhllpk[/youtube]
It's survival PVP server built strongly in medieval character. And we should be proud of good chosen plugins which make for us easy to create privileges for players and organise tournaments or events in many ways.
By joining the server you agree to the following rules:
1. Each administrator has a permission to edit rules 2. You can't use nicknames of youtubers and other people 3. Administrators are not responsible for your lost items 4. Griefing is not allowed 5. Using hacks and mods which make game easier to play is not allowed 6. Using bad words or insulting someone is not allowed 7. Using game bugs and server bugs is not allowed 8. Making multi accounts is not allowed 9. Selling items from game for real money is not allowed 10. Spamming, using caps without any reason is not allowed 11. Advertisements of other servers is not allowed (advertising youtube channel is allowed) 12. Begging for gamemode, op, fly, items, teleport is not allowed 13. Vips can't fight with other players while flying 14. Leaving the server or trying to teleport to another place while fighting is not allowed
Our IP is: [b]78.63.244.96[/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/FtkSGxs.png[/img]

item.title: MineKingdom <City> <Survival> <PVP>
item.dc:creator: @LukeCzun LukeCzun
item.description:
@LukeCzun wrote:

LQ6VZdW.png728×90

[size=36pt]MineKingdom[/size]

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GGdT8uhllpk[/youtube]

It’s survival PVP server built strongly in medieval character. And we should be proud of good chosen plugins which make for us easy to create privileges for players and organise tournaments or events in many ways.

By joining the server you agree to the following rules:

  1. Each administrator has a permission to edit rules
  2. You can’t use nicknames of youtubers and other people
  3. Administrators are not responsible for your lost items
  4. Griefing is not allowed
  5. Using hacks and mods which make game easier to play is not allowed
  6. Using bad words or insulting someone is not allowed
  7. Using game bugs and server bugs is not allowed
  8. Making multi accounts is not allowed
  9. Selling items from game for real money is not allowed
  10. Spamming, using caps without any reason is not allowed
  11. Advertisements of other servers is not allowed (advertising youtube channel is allowed)
  12. Begging for gamemode, op, fly, items, teleport is not allowed
  13. Vips can’t fight with other players while flying
  14. Leaving the server or trying to teleport to another place while fighting is not allowed

Our IP is:
78.63.244.96

FtkSGxs.png728×90
